statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{-x^{2} + 4 \, x + 2 , -3 \, x^{3} + 4 \, x^{2} - x - 6 , 3 \, x^{3} - 6 \, x^{2} + 9 \, x + 10 , 7 \, x^{2} - 28 \, x - 14 , 12 \, x^{3} - 21 \, x^{2} + 24 \, x + 34\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
